summary: **Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem** is a 2023 animated superhero movie. It's a new take on the famous Ninja Turtles, with a focus on them being teenagers. The film follows the Turtles as they team up with April O'Neil to fight a bad guy named Superfly. Many famous actors voice the characters, like Seth Rogen and John Cena. The movie was made by Seth Rogen and others, and it's getting good reviews. People like the fun story, cool animation, and funny moments. It's doing well in theaters too. There's even talk of a sequel and a new TV show!
title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Mutant Mayhem
